PREFACE.
This isacompanion volume totheKhasi-English Dictionary
bythesome author which waspublished byGovernment in1900.
Inhisletter dated the1stFebruary 1907 toGovernment the
author wrote:—
“Sofarasthearrangement oftheEnglish words isconcerned, 1claim
nooriginality inthematter;theyhave been putdown %sthey areinan
ordinary popular English Dictionary. The pronunoia.. atinEnglish have
specially wengiven tomeet thewants ofKha istudents."
Agreeably tothesanction oonveyed inGovernment letter
No.41450., dated the30thMarch 1907, thelateUNissor Singh
prepared themanuscript ofthisDictionary whioh was revised by
aCommittee composed ofthefollowing gentlemen—
!(Mr. F.E.Jackson,
Mr.L.0.Clarke and
Mr.B.C.Allen).
BaiSahib Dohory Ropmay,
U-Hajom Kissor Singh,
UNissor Singh (theauthor).
TheCommittee were assisted bythefollowing gentlemen to
each ofwhom wasallotted forrevision thomanuscript ofoneor
more letters oftheAlphabet:—.
The Rev. Walter Firminger (now Aioh*Deacon of
Calcutta),
The lateRev. C.L.Stephens,
TheRev. J.C.Evans, and
Khan SahibAmjad Ali,
towhom thebestthanks oftheCommittee arodue.
After having been passed bythoRevision Committee the
manuscripts were sent totheSecretariat l’ress letter byletter.
Theauthor readtheproofs from theletterAtopart ofO
which were sent tohimfromtime totime astheywere issued
from thePress until hisdeath atTura, Garo Hills, which took
place onthe20th February 1918 attheageof48years. Tho
proofs oftheremaining letters were readbyUH.K.Singhwho
alsowrote theKey topronu liciation andthe lists ofabbrevia
tions.
Theauthor wasanenthusiast inthecause oteducation, the
following being alistofhisworks:—
TheKbasi-English Dictionary (published bytheAssam
Secretariat Press.)
Hints ontheStudy oftheKbasi Language.
Kbasi Arithmetic.
Khasi Mental Arithmetic.
Mental Arithmetic intheGaro Language (not publi-
shed).
JKaskul badUNonghikai (The 8chool and the
Teacher), published bytheEiKhasi Press,Mawkhan
Shillong.
Itishoped that thisbook willsupply along-felt want and
willserve asagoodfoundation foranyimprovements whichmay
bemade inthefuture.
A.W.DENTITH.
Shillong :
Septemler 1020Deputy Commissioner,
Khaii andJain itaHills.
